name: Asteroid belt (binglo)
description:
This is a school project to make a game inspired by the arcade game asteroid

Controls (Keyboard):

Move left: A, Left arrow

Move right: D, Right arrow

Shoot: W, Up arrow

Power up: S, down arrow

Controls (Controller):

Move left: Left/ right stick, left, D-pad left

Move right: Left/ right stick, right, D-pad right

Shoot: Left/ right sitck, up, D-pad up

Power up: Left/ right stick, down, D-pad down
